dcterms:creator: Piyush Sharma
Nan Ding
Sebastian Goodman
Radu Soricut
dcterms:description: A collection of 3.3 million image-caption pairs automatically scraped from alt-text enabled web images. The average length of captions is around 10. It is easy to collect, and each image-text pair exists high information overlap.
dcterms:title: Conceptual Captions Dataset

dcterms:creator: John Arevalo
Thamar Solorio
Manuel Montes-y Gómez
Fabio A González
dcterms:description: Built from the Movielens 20M dataset, the MM-IMDb dataset comprises 25,959 movies along with their plot, poster, genres and other 50 additional metadata fields. In this setting, (poster, plot) is used as the image-text pair.
dcterms:title: MM-IMDb Dataset
